name: Top Flying Endless Butterfly for Kids and Toddlers
name_original: Top Flying Endless Butterfly for Kids and Toddlers
description:
PLAY ANYWHERE - NO WIFI NEEDED!!!
SAFE AND KID-FRIENDLY!!!
NO IN-APP PURCHASE!!!
JUST PURE FUN!!!

Be warned: This game is insanely addictive and will test your skills.

******************************************************************************

Top Flying Endless Butterfly for Kids and Toddlers is an endless game. Challenge yourself to keep the butterfly flying. Avoid being killed by the cactuses and spiders.

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME?
1. Tap anywhere to keep the butterfly flying.
2. Avoid the spider and lightning.
3. Tap on the Play button to start the game.
4. Collect all the coins.
5. Get the best score

Other features:
- Beat your best score
- Nice background music

Have fun playing the game.

Don't forget to write a review and rate it.

Thanks in advance.

******************************************************************************
